text: Rainbow jersey The Men's sprint at the 2011 UCI Para-cycling Track World Championships was held on March 13. 48 athletes participated in the contest. After the qualifying heats, the fastest 8 riders advanced to the Quarterfinals. The first rider in each quarterfinal advanced to the semifinals and the 4 losing athletes raced for 5th-8th place. ==Results== ===Qualifying=== Men's Sprint B - Qualifying - Results , Official website of the 2011 UCI Para-cycling Track World Championships {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
